name: Surfadoc
overview:
We’re pleased to present you with an extensive and reliable directory for patients to use while making important health-related decisions, both within the United States and globally. Patients are able to view healthcare provider information from any country in the world, schedule appointments, see pictures of the doctors and their facilities, and leave user ratings. Your online profile is free, and it always will be! Users are encouraged to ask questions on forums, start a blog and save pertinent health information on our secure site. Users can also see the healthcare provider’s procedures, cost and participating insurance providers.

   Create your online profile today and begin a well-informed search for the quality care that you and your family deserve! surfadoc.com/

    If you are interested in seeking treatment or a procedure outside of your home country, then let Surfadoc.com assist you in your research. Medical tourism is a growing practice among U.S. citizens and allows patients to make educated decisions about their health that may be unavailable or costly in their home country. The safety of our patients and their families is valued above all else, and we pledge to connect you with reputable and highly qualified health care providers around the globe.
